headline: Jim Cramer reveals his top stocks in 7 under-the-radar bull markets
summary: "Main Street may indeed need a stimulus deal, but Wall Street can do just fine without one, and so can your portfolio as long as you focus on the bull markets that don't need no stinking bailout," the "Mad Money" host said.

headline: AMC CEO: Keeping movie theaters open is 'the right decision' even as rival Regal shutters screens
summary: AMC chief executive Adam Aron pointed to the company's agreement with Universal Pictures as one reason to keep operating theaters during the pandemic.

summary: When Apple TV+ launched last fall, Apple bundled a free one-year subscription with the purchase of an Apple product, immediately boosting the number of people who could watch the streaming service.

headline: Here's a first look at Google's plans for its massive San Jose campus

summary: Founded in 2013 by PayPal co-founder Max Levchin, Affirm has become one of the fastest-growing "buy now pay later" start-ups.

summary: A new report from Crunchbase shows that a huge funding gap still exists for Black and Latinx founders.

headline: A breakdown of whether the Democrats' stimulus bill is actually a 'bailout' of blue states
summary: The House of Representatives' $2.2 trillion stimulus bill is not a bailout of blue states that voted for Hillary Clinton in 2016, but it does provide more funds to states run by Democratic governors.

headline: Here's the likelihood of getting a $1,200 stimulus check in the next 26 days
summary: President Trump said stimulus negotiations apparently have resumed as of today. Here are the chances that the talks will end with a payment to your bank account before the election.
